name: Sailors & Sorcerers: Leviathan's Fall Super Scuffed Edition
name_original: Sailors & Sorcerers: Leviathan's Fall Super Scuffed Edition
description:
Made for the Portland Indie Game Squad Summer Slow Jam: Stealth!

Technical theme: Stealth
Creative theme: Critters

What does Super Scuffed Edition mean?  It means corners were cut, placeholder graphics , and host  of other missing things!

The Lore: The oceans are vast and deep, but none are more dangerous than Deep Sea.  A grand expanse of water of an abyssal blue hue, masking the impossible depths below, and the whatever lurks below. Despite the ever present danger there have been a few enterprising groups that have setup a port or two in the heart of the Deep Sea.

Leviathan's Fall follows  the adventure of captain as their adventure comes to an end, and a much stranger one begins!


Controls:

Arrow Keys for movement!

Left Control : Shape Shift Menu (When accessible)

Left Shift:  Special ability Timed Dash (Humaniod), Hide in Shel (Crab form)

Empire Font by somepx
